data.text: A fantastic location, great staff, a lovely sleep and scrumptious food, but sadly the Turkish economy is taking its toll on the hotel. No international charging ports, no English language programs on TV, and very few English speakers. This was a lovely stay I just with Erdogan would help his country try and people rather than himself!
data.title: Good but not great. Lovely place and great service.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest ,
Thank you very much for taking the time to tell us about your experience at Mövenpick Hotel Izmir. Your comments are very valuable to us.We would like you to know that we have taken the necessary measures to solve the problem. Our goal is to completely exceed your expectations on your next trip. Your feedback is very valuable and we thank you very much. Your comments will be forwarded to the relevant departments and necessary actions will be taken. We will be happy to welcome you again at Mövenpick Hotel Izmir. 
Best regards, 
Hotel Management
owner_response.author: İlker Şen

data.text:
Nice location... nice hotel. The room was spacious, clean and very practical.
Attentive staff, if you are a man... A bit disappointed.
Excellent breakfast and amenities. It has a bar with a beautiful view on the top floor.
In general, the hotel is good.
data.title: Nice location.. nice hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Lau Medina,
Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience at the Mövenpick Hotel Izmir. We are sorry that your experience did not meet your expectations.
We would like to apologise in advance as it appears that something during your experience did not happen in the positive way we usually strive to do things. The only way we can improve is by knowing the details, so we would be very grateful if you would consider sending your feedback and suggestions to İzmir.guest.relations@movenpick.com so we can pro-actively work on creating a better experience.
We wished that you had told us your inconvenience situation, then we could have helped you.
We appreciate your sharing your comments, and it is our hope that you will give us the opportunity to better serve you in the near future.
Sincerely,
Hotel Management
owner_response.author: İlker Şen

data.text: I stayed here for 2 nights. The room was not so clean. Also they just charge one shower kit for three person. But location is great. Breakfast great. Access to public transportation was good. The staff are friendly. At the end I do not suggest it.
data.title: It is not worth it.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
Thank you very much for taking your valuable time to share your rating with us about your stay at our hotel and for choosing Mövenpick Hotel Izmir.We are deeply saddened by the unfortunate inconveniences you have confronted during your accomodation in our hotel.Please accept our the most sincere apologies for issues.We can inform and improve both ourselves and our employees thanks to your feedback. As Mövenpick Hotel İzmir employees, we try to make a difference with our service quality, manners and the way we welcome our guests. For this reason, your opinion is very valuable to us.Please be assured that your comments are taken seriously and will be feedback to the relevant heads of department for their attention.I would like to state that we will be pleased to welcome you again in our hotel and we will do our best for you to have a pleasant stay.
Best Regards,
Hotel management.
owner_response.author: İlker Şen

data.text:
This hotel is next to Aegean Sea, nice view. Centrally located.

The room was nice and comfortable with good view to the sea.

We were a group of 40+ people. The restaurant offer buffet, both breakfast and dinner, with a good variation of food and the service was excellent. The  WiFi signal was good.
data.title: Hotel Next to Aegean Sea

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
Thank you very much for sharing your nice comments about Mövenpick Hotel Izmir with us.
We look forward to welcoming you at our hotel.
Regards.
Hotel management.
owner_response.author: İlker Şen
